fcd8a1ed-cf4c-4178-a241-f64c0a406e59.description: Earners of this badge have successfully engaged in this learning series and have demonstrated the ability to: Generate evaluation and learning questions designed to increase leaders’ ability to make informed and confident decisions, Craft measurable outcome statements that communicate your programs’ value and intentions and Gain knowledge of tools that support continuous quality improvement models and thought processes that leaders can use to turn data into learning and improvement.
fcd8a1ed-cf4c-4178-a241-f64c0a406e59.name: United Way Academy Data and Outcomes Learning Series

issuer.summary: issued by United Way of Greater St. Louis

entity.name: United Way of Greater St. Louis

badge_template_activities.title: This course is open to safety net agencies

This course is developed for senior leadership and above. This learning series gives your agency’s senior leader the opportunity to explore tools and apply concepts from evaluative thinking, quality improvement, and performance management to equip agency leaders to leverage meaningful, measurable, and manageable data.
Successful participation/completion of all 3 sections of this course
